meanings.sent1: The bustling market was thronging with shoppers looking for bargains.
meanings.sent2: The concert hall was thronging with excited fans waiting for the show to start.
meanings.sent3: The zoo was thronging with visitors eager to see the new baby panda.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were thronging with pedestrians, creating a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The stadium was thronging with cheering spectators, creating a vibrant energy.

meanings.definition: Filled with a large number of people or things
meanings.sent1: The classroom was thronging with students eager to learn.
meanings.sent2: The library was thronging with books on every subject imaginable.
meanings.sent3: The garden was thronging with colorful flowers blooming in the spring.
meanings.sent4: The market was thronging with fresh produce from local farmers.
meanings.sent5: The museum was thronging with artifacts from ancient civilizations.

meanings.sent1: The thronging parade marched down the street, filled with music and laughter.
meanings.sent2: The thronging crowd followed the tour guide through the historic city center.
meanings.sent3: The thronging herd of elephants made their way across the savanna.
meanings.sent4: The thronging protesters peacefully marched for their cause through the city.
meanings.sent5: The thronging school of fish moved gracefully through the clear waters of the reef.
